title: Drunk businessman molests air hostesses on Jet Airways Mumbai-Nagpur flight, he grabbed them during meal serving | Zee News
text:
Drunk businessman molests air hostesses on Jet Airways Mumbai-Nagpur flight, he grabbed them during meal serving By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Monday, February 27, 2017 - 09:21 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
Nagpur: In a shameful incident, a drunk businessman molested two air hostesses of Jet Airways on Mumbai-Nagpur flight. 
The business allegedly grabbed their hands while the two were serving him meal, according to a report in TOI. 
The 23-year-old drunk man, identified as Akash Gupta, has been arrested after the air hostesses gave a written complaint to the flight captain against him. 
Reportedly, Gupta is a native of Balaghat in Madhya Pradesh. 
Cops interrogated Gupta and on Sunday produced him before the court which sent him to magisterial custody . 
Gupta had gone to Goa on a vacation. 
First Published: Monday, February 27, 2017 - 09:21 More from zeenews
